Package interfaces

Interface IGraph<Vertex>

  • Type Parameters:
    Vertex - Type of Vertex used
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Graph
    public interface IGraph<Vertex>
    Interface for the implementation of a graph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addEdge​(Vertex vertex1, Edge edge)
      Adds an edge between two vertices
      void breadthFirstSearch​(Vertex startVertex)
      Traverses the graph using Breadth-First Search
      boolean deleteEdge​(Vertex vertex1, Vertex vertex2)
      Deletes an edge connecting two vertices
      boolean edgeExists​(Vertex vertex1, Vertex vertex2)
      Determines if an edge between two vertices exists in the graph
      java.lang.Object findEdge​(Vertex vertex1, Vertex vertex2)
      Finds an edge between two vertices, then returns it
      java.lang.Object findWeight​(Vertex vertex1, Vertex vertex2)
      Finds the weight of an edge between two vertices
      boolean isEmpty()
      Determines if the graph is empty
      int numEdges()
      Returns the number of edges in the graph
      int numVertices()
      Returns the number of vertices in the graph
